productId.description: The unique identifier of the product.

shortDescription.description: The short description of the product.

description.description: The full description of the product.

forSale.description: Information on the sale status of the product. Indicates if the product can be added to the shopping basket.

specialOffer.description: Indicates if the product is a special offer.

deliveryWeight.description: The delivery weight of the product.

shippingMethodsRestrictedTo.description: Information on possible shipping method restrictions, e.g. express delivery only. Can be `null` if no restrictions exist.

availabilityText.description: Additional custom information on the product's stock level or the delivery period.

availability.description: The availablility of the product, e.g. in stock.

energyLabelsString.description: A list of energy labels applied to this product. Can be one or two values. If two values are returned, the first value is the best energy label, the second is the second-best.

energyLabelSourceFile.description: An image or PDF file containing the energy label image supplied by the manufacturer

productDataSheet.description: An image or PDF file containing a datasheet with technical information on the product. Has to be available if the product has an energy label.

sfUrl.description: The link to storefront URL of the product.

productNumber.description: The product number for the product.

upc.description: The Universal Product Code of the product.

ean.description: The European Article Number of the product, either EAN-8 or EAN-13.

links.description: The references the product is linked to.
